issue.title: [C++][Documentation] Make in-table references consistent
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13137](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13137). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the [C++ documentation of compute functions](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/cpp/compute.rst), in-table references to notes are placed inconsistently. Some tables have a **Notes** column while others embed note references with corresponding text. To be consistent, use the **Notes** column approach.

Also, the raw syntax for in-table references is inconsistent. Some cases use **(1)** while others use **\(1)**.
